name: Bullet Time-Hell
description:
A bullethell game where you use  your time manipulation to the fullest!

Dash your way through walls of bullets and slow time to give just the edge you need in order to get through challenging barrages of bullets from the enemy!

Not had enough of the bullets? Try to beat your high score in Endless Mode! See how many points you can accumulate and how long you can survive for!

Disclaimer: This project was made as a 5 week student project. Any bugs reported are not guaranteed to be fixed.
